page.title: 13GREASLEY BEAUVALE JUNIORS
page.content: The{Greasley Board School}was opened in 1878 and originally was housed in 3 departments.The girls used the Dovecote Rd. wing,the boys the Mill Rd. wing and the infants the part situated diagonally between.The Register shows that{D.H.Lawrence}was a pupil at the school for periods from { {1889}to{1898.}Since 1976 the Dovecote Road School has been used exclusively for infants and the new school building, which was opened in phases from{1965,}has been used for the juniors.Since then the junior school has seen many changes and a new extension was added in 1980.The junior school at present has 283 children on roll with a headmaster and ten teachers.The two schools are known as the{Greasley Beauvale Inf. School}and the{Greasley Beauvale Junior School.
